app_description: Turn your device into a karaoke machine! Singa karaoke app gives you free access to a huge library of high quality karaoke songs. You can sing on your own make it a party with friends or find the nearest Singa powered karaoke venue and hit the stage. Sing karaoke anywhere anytime iPhone iPad Apple TV computer or Singa powered karaoke venues All the best songs Constantly updated library of high quality karaoke songs from timeless classics to latest hits Hundreds of themed singlists Find the right songs for every moment High definition background videos Looks crisp and clear on screens of any size Transposition Adjust the song s pitch to suits your voice Guide vocals Helps you sing your way through an unfamiliar song Big screen karaoke Use the Singa Apple TV app to upgrade your karaoke game at home Singa powered karaoke venues Find the nearest karaoke venue using the Singa mobile app request a song and hit the stage Singa karaoke app takes you from boredom to karaoke stardom. Whether you re a pro or just starting a new hobby you ll feel at home with Singa. Try for free! You can visit our website at https: singa.com Follow us on Facebook singamusic Follow us on Instagram singakaraoke SINGA PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION Singa Premium is an auto renewable monthly or yearly subscription that lets you sing karaoke as much as your heart desires. Any unused portion of a free premium trial period if offered will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription during the free trial. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account. You can cancel a free premium trial or subscription anytime by turning off the auto renewal through your Apple ID account settings. This must be done at least 24 hours before the end of a free trial or subscription period to avoid being charged.
